anti_patterns.description: Multiple random edits to fix a single issue without understanding the root cause
anti_patterns.detection: 3+ edits to same file in a session with errors between edits
anti_patterns.remedy: Use systematic-debugging skill. Read error fully. Binary search for root cause.

anti_patterns.description: Same error type appearing across 2+ sessions
anti_patterns.remedy: Create permanent fix: checklist, automated test, or lint rule.

anti_patterns.description: Excessive token usage for simple code changes
anti_patterns.remedy: Check for existing patterns/libraries. Plan before coding. Use targeted tools.

anti_patterns.description: Using grep+read loops when LSP or AST tools would be more effective
Silencing type/lint errors instead of fixing root cause
anti_patterns.remedy: Fix the actual type error. Suppression creates hidden bugs.

anti_patterns.description: Debug attempt that did not resolve the issue
anti_patterns.detection: Same error appearing 3+ times in a session after edit attempts
anti_patterns.remedy: Change approach entirely. Consider asking for help or reading docs.

anti_patterns.description: Working in a state where build/tests are failing
anti_patterns.remedy: Fix build FIRST. Never layer changes on a broken foundation.

positive_patterns.description: Fixed issue in a single attempt: read → edit → verify
Used advanced tools (AST-grep, LSP) for structural code manipulation
Effectively delegated work to sub-agents or parallel tasks
Resolved task in few messages with high efficiency

metadata.author: opencode-learning-engine
metadata.purpose: Base catalog of known patterns for bootstrapping the learning engine
metadata.weighting_philosophy: Anti-patterns are HEAVILY weighted (3-5x) over positive patterns. Avoiding failure > repeating success.
